name: Life is Strange: Before the Storm - Episode 1: Awake
name_original: Life is Strange: Before the Storm - Episode 1: Awake
description:
Life is Strange: Before the Storm - Episode 1: Awake is an adventure game. It was originally released in 2017. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Life is Strange: Before the Storm - Episode 1: Awake is available on PC.
